devdoc.author: Sven Meyer
devdoc.details: functions passing structs can be tested using the experimental ABIEncoderV2

addItem(string,string).details: add a new item to the image galleryemits ItemAdded event

params._url: URL to the media file (image or video)

addItemStruct((uint256,string,string)).details: add a new item to the image galleryemits ItemAdded eventPassing structs is only supported in the new experimental ABI encoder - use with care!

params.item: struct to be added to gallery

constructor.details: always good to know who deployed the contract

getItemByIndex(uint256).details: retrieve item by index from image galleryItem struct will be decomposed and the elements will be returned individually
getItemByIndex(uint256).return: url URL to the media file (image or video)caption Caption text for media item

getItemStructByIndex(uint256).details: retrive item  by index as struct from image galleryemits ItemAdded eventPassing structs is only supported in the new experimental ABI encoder - use with care!
